alert.note: Alert for Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 11:02PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Smith County through 1130 PM CDT... At 1102 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Smith Center, or 28 miles east of Phillipsburg, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Smith Center around 1110 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
